# Documents Directory

Place your documents here (e.g., resume, CV, portfolio PDFs).

## Usage

Reference documents in your pages like this:

```html
<a href="/assets/docs/your-resume.pdf">Download Resume</a>
```

Or in Markdown:

```markdown
[Download Resume](/assets/docs/your-resume.pdf)
```

## Common Documents

- Resume/CV
- Portfolio PDF
- Certificates
- Publications
- Other downloadable content
